title: Fantasy III & IV - Game Music Pack - Orchestral, RPG, Fantasy Emotional BGM
description: Made exclusively for RPGs, Adventure and Fantasy games, Epic Fantasy is a Game Music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From valiant heroes saving their village to talking animals seeking justice for their kingdom, Epic Fantasy is a collection of Game Music packs tailor-made for those classic tales we adore. These packs offer a rich tapestry of orchestral and fantasy-inspired melodies, perfect for breathing life into your RPG and adventure game worlds.


Listen to the Soundtrack Packs here:


  • Epic Fantasy Pack 3
  • Epic Fantasy Pack 4


What’s Inside:


  • Pack 1:
  • 8 Original High-Quality Music Tracks
  • 8 Original High-Quality Music Loops
  • 16 Total Files
  • Pack 2:
  • 7 Original High-Quality Music Tracks
  • 7 Original High-Quality Music Loops
  • 14 Total Files


Both Packs Include:


  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License


Tracklists:

Epic Fantasy Pack 1:


(00:00) 01 - Says Who

(00:33) 02 - He is Around

(01:03) 03 - From that Mountain

(01:37) 04 - Pegasus

(02:07) 05 - Brilliant Mind

(02:35) 06 - Brilliant Mind (Piano Only)

(03:09) 07 - Threat Under Us

(03:36) 08 - Threat Under Us (Alt Version)


Epic Fantasy Pack 2:


(00:00) 01 - Rise Your Sword

(00:48) 02 - Menu Theme

(01:30) 03 - Blessing and Curse

(02:18) 04 - Blessing and Curse (Piano Version)

(03:00) 05 - Non Sense

(03:39) 06 - Builders of the World

(04:27) 07 - This Village is Unique


(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


With these Game Music/Soundtrack packs, you also:


  • Sound Great in Any Device: All music themes are fully mixed and mastered to ensure quality on any platform.
  • Avoid Incongruent Volumes: All themes are mastered with consistent volume for a smooth listening experience.
  • Repeat Music Seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able for uninterrupted background music during gameplay.


About the Composer:


Lufus is a music producer and composer who has created the Original Soundtracks for popular games such as:


  • Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)
  • Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)
  • Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads) and more


Support & Help:


If you need help downloading these soundtrack/music packs, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Crafted for Epic Adventures: Immerse players in grand fantasy worlds with orchestral and thematic music designed for RPGs and adventure games.
  • Two Distinct Packs: Provides a wider variety of fantasy music to suit different in-game moods, environments, and scenarios.
  • High-Quality Audio: WAV file format delivers crystal-clear sound quality.
  • Seamless Looping: All music tracks loop perfectly, ensuring smooth, continuous playback during gameplay.
  • Professionally Mastered: Enjoy balanced volume levels and polished audio throughout each pack.
  • Royalty-Free License: Use the music freely in your commercial and non-commercial game projects.

Number of Audio WAVs: 30 Total (16 in Pack 1 & 14 in Pack 2)

Number of Audio Cues: 30 Total (16 in Pack 1 & 14 in Pack 2)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 32bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 20

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes (WAV files are platform-independent)

Documentation: https://youtu.be/UQt8952AAWk.

Important/Additional Notes:

  • For any support needs, buyers can contact the composer at iamlufus@gmail.com.
